question: 言葉つき
sourceMnemonic: Remember how <ja>言葉</ja> means "language?" Well when you add <ja>つき</ja> to the end of it you end up talking the whole time the moon (<ja>つき</ja>) is out and paying more attention to your own <vocabulary>speech</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>wording</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
